title: De KleinKeuken
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Take-out, European
description: A vegetarian restaurant using organic and seasonal vegetables in its dishes ranging from a zucchini pasta to an oven dish. Vegan items are indicated. Has a pick-your-own salad bar. Reservations are recommended or take-out. Sells package-free grocery items like almonds, dates, buckwheat, and other bulk items - bring your own containers.
